keyword: how many calories are in avocado toast
title: How Many Calories Are in Avocado Toast?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in avocado toast with a full nutrition breakdown, macros, healthy fat details, and easy variations for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Avocado Toast?
assumptions: One slice of whole grain bread (28g), topped with half a medium avocado (68g) mashed, with a pinch of salt; no additional toppings or oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, avocado size, ripeness, and added ingredients like oil or seasonings. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of avocado toast provides about 250 kcal, rich in healthy monounsaturated fats and fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one poached egg on top
Use full avocado instead of half
Add 1 tsp olive oil when mashing

faqs.q: How many calories are in avocado toast?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal per serving under standard assumptions.

faqs.q: Is avocado toast high in healthy fats?
faqs.a: Yes, with ~16 g total fat, mostly monounsaturated from the avocado.

faqs.q: How much protein is in avocado toast?
faqs.a: Around 6 g protein per serving, mainly from the bread.

faqs.q: Does avocado toast have a lot of fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, approximately 7 g fiber, thanks to the avocado and whole grain bread.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in avocado toast?
faqs.a: Use less avocado, opt for thinner bread slices, or skip added salt/oil.
